post:
The National Day of Singapore is celebrated every year on August 9, in commemoration of the Singapore's independence from Malaysia in the year 1965. We would like to celebrate this event with our friends.

So we decided to start a new promotion.

Please use the links under the product to order. No promotion code is needed, and the product price will stay the same until you cancel. The offer lasts until we run out of stock. 

All offers are available in Los Angeles, <del>Singapore</del>, Frankfurt and Washington. _In Frankfurt and Washington, we even include the powerful 500 Gbits DDoS protection from Voxility for free._

**SG NATIONAL DAY SPECIAL 1GB**

* 1 x Core
* 1 GB dedicated RAM
* 15 GB SSD
* 2000 GB traffic per month.
* 1 x IPv4 (IPv6 on request)
* KVM
* 1Gbps uplink (<del>200Mbs in Singapore</del>)

https://safehousecloud.com/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=60

**Monthly 3 USD - yearly 30 USD.**

**SG NATIONAL DAY SPECIAL 2GB**

* 2 x Core
* 2 GB dedicated RAM
* 25 GB SSD
* 4000 GB traffic per month.
* 1 x IPv4 (IPv6 on request)
* KVM
* 1Gbps uplink (<del>200Mbs  in Singapore</del>)

https://safehousecloud.com/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=61

**Monthly 6 USD - yearly 60 USD.**

VPNs (personal and commercial) are welcome! 

We accept payment via Credi-/Debitcard, PayPal and BitPay (BitCoin) and Bank transfer. All servers deployed instantly after the payment is processed.

You can choose from a wide selection of Linux templates or install your OS manually via ISO. If your preferred OS is not on our list, we can add the ISO for you. Windows 2012 R2 / 2008 / 2003 via ISO installation possible. Windows included a license and is free for you.

We operate two AS:

AS135027

AS64094

Los Angeles, http://looking.la.safehousecloud.com

Washington, http://looking.wa.safehousecloud.com

Frankfurt, http://looking.fra.safehousecloud.com

Singapore, http://looking.sg.safehousecloud.com

Benchmark:

http://serverbear.com/benchmark/2016/04/28/JsJfOKiXint25Bct

Node hardware:

Dell, HP or SuperMicro Servers
1x or 2x Intel Xeon (E5 & E3)
32-128GB RAM
SSD Only
1-10 Gbps uplink

Our company fully owns all Server and Network Equipment. Our company is registered in Singapore and the US. We provide 24x7x365 support via Ticket and Email. More information? 

https://safehousecloud.com
